title: After family's murder, father wants convicted son's life spared
text:
After family's murder, father wants convicted son's life spared 3:15pm EST - 01:40 
Kent Whitaker, who survived a deadly domestic attack hatched by his son, is pushing the state of Texas to grant clemency to the condemned man, although it has never spared a death row inmate solely at the formal request of the victim's family. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
